reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The objective of the evaluation project is to support fulfilment the effectiveness and the objectives of the Programme. This happens according to the evaluation plan through annual evaluations of the country programmes and following recommendations risen b y evaluations. #Countries and projects to be evaluated are decided together with the regional management. The evaluations of the programme period 2018-2021 are concentrating especially country programmes mid-term reviews and final evaluations. The evaluati ons review the content of the programmes, but also the new country programme concept to quarantee quality and effectiveness of the Programme. #The evaluation plan has been done during program planning, and according to this plan each country programme will be evaluated during programme period 2018-2021. After the evaluation journey the preliminary discussion, where findings are presented, is organized in a country programme office. When final evaluation report is ready, the debriefing session, where recomme ndations are presented by evaluators, will be organized. After the recommendations are given, follow-up plan is filled by regional debuty director and country representative. #The evaluation plan of the year 2018 includes two mid-term reviews, which are in Cambodia and food security programme in Eastern Africa. In 2018, a new programme period 2018-2021 will start. Because of this evaluation plan of 2018 is concentrating to those projects that started already in previous programme period. Main emphasis on ev aluations are in second and third project years.
